duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver exceptional customer service and sales support in a retail setting.
Effectively present products, address customer inquiries, and assist in product selection.
Guide and engage customers, ensuring a positive experience and satisfaction with the service offerings.
Use innovative technology to provide detailed information and support to customers.
Collaborate with team members to create a positive and energetic atmosphere in the retail environment.
Participate in sales and operations management, setting and achieving goals while ensuring a high-quality customer experience.
Coach dental partners to promote company initiatives and drive patient referrals.
Lead initiatives to drive business growth and patient referrals for dental partner practices.
Assist in setting up SmileShop or Partner Network Practices for success.
